scripts.build: npm install && npm run build-ts && npm run make-header
scripts.build-release: npm install && npm run build-ts && npm run make-header-release
scripts.bundle: mkdir -p build &> /dev/null && browserify --node --standalone _ --external process --ignore-missing dist/lib/index.js -o build/output1.js && babel build/output1.js --out-file build/soundhole_js_bundle.js
scripts.bundle-release: mkdir -p build &> /dev/null && browserify --node --standalone _ --external process --ignore-missing dist/lib/index.js -o build/output1.js && ./tools/minify_if_changed.sh build/output1.js build/soundhole_js_bundle_release.js
scripts.make-header: npm run bundle && cd build && xxd -i soundhole_js_bundle.js > soundhole_js_bundle.h
scripts.make-header-release: npm run bundle-release && cd build && xxd -i soundhole_js_bundle_release.js > soundhole_js_bundle.h
